author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Fix warnings reported here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41795 . The changes are similar to what was done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41826 .

#### PR validation:

No special validation
title: Fix Walloc-size-larger-than warnings in SimG4CMS/Forward/*NumberingScheme
